metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14062 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the decode_digit function in puny_decode.c in Libidn2before 2.0.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service orpossibly have unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14062` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

idn - 1.33-2
libidn11 - 1.33-2
libidn11-java - 1.33-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libidn package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.33-2').
